default.items.0.label: Item 1
default.items.1.label: Item 2
default.items.2.label: Item 3
description:
Displaying components as a list with labels placed on the left.

If you don't need labels, use [view.list](view.list.md).
properties.items.items.default.label: Label
properties.items.items.properties.center:
If `true`, a `label` is center-aligned relative to the content of a list item (`content`). Use it if the list consists of large items, such as images or multi-line text.

By default, `false` (the label is aligned to the top of the content block).
properties.items.items.properties.hint.d: A pop-up hint displayed next to a label.
A label displayed next to a list item.
properties.minWidth.description: The minimum width of list content. If the component width is less than the specified value, it switches to compact mode.
